Configuring a storage system workflow

Configure a storage system in order to manage storage using Storage Advisor. Complete the following in order to configure a storage system:

  • Create parity groups so you can create pools.

  • Create pools so you can create volumes.

  • Enable port security. Post security must be enabled for a host storage domain (HSD) to be created on the port. If port security is disabled Storage Advisor will not select the port for HSD creation. In that case, if the user selects the port, they are limited to the default host group.
